channel.title: PostgreSQL on Happiness Development
channel.description: Recent content in PostgreSQL on Happiness Development

item.title: PostgreSQL - 명령어 정리(Command)
item.description: PostgreSQL - 명령어 정리(Command) Install on Mac https://formulae.brew.sh/formula/postgresql install Command brew install postgresql Server start pg_ctl -D /usr/local/var/postgres start Server stop pg_ctl -D /usr/local/var/postgres stop status check export PGDATA='/usr/local/var/postgres' pg_ctl status
